description: Virtual Sapiens makes training stick through our Train, Practice, Perform AI coaching platform. Our coaching platform supports skills validation and integration through immersive, AI Role Plays, and in the work flow feedback. With Virtual Sapiens, employees improve in measurable and sustainable ways, at scale.
problem_statement: Corporate training programs are one size fits all and 'check the box'. Real ROI is impossible to measure and miscommunication, lost productivity and low engagement leads to over $1.2 Trillion in lost revenue opportunities. Our platform meets a gap in market when it comes to the integration and validation of essential skills at mid to large companies. With our platform integrated into new hire onboarding, general employee upskilling and manager training, companies empower their teams to thrive, own their impact and deliver at scale.

team.justification: The founding team of Virtual Sapiens demonstrates strong execution ability and domain expertise. Rachel Cossar, CEO, brings a unique background in nonverbal communication and presence coaching, while Neal Kaiser, CTO, has extensive experience in enterprise-level SaaS technology. Their complementary skills and aligned vision have been instrumental in developing a proprietary AI platform that addresses a significant market need.

company_assessment.business_model_strength: Virtual Sapiens employs a robust B2B model with recurring revenue streams through annual service fees and per-user pricing. The model is scalable and integrates well with existing corporate training programs, providing a competitive edge.
company_assessment.market_positioning: The company positions itself as a leader in AI-driven corporate training, offering a unique value proposition with its immersive role-play and skills validation features. This differentiation is crucial in a market saturated with generic training solutions.
company_assessment.execution_capability: The team has successfully launched and scaled their product, evidenced by a 100% revenue growth over the past six months and a strong client base including major corporations like eBay and HP.
company_assessment.strategic_vision: Virtual Sapiens has a clear strategic vision to expand its market reach and enhance its go-to-market strategy within the HR and people development space, aiming to close significant deals and increase brand visibility.
